body:
I was thinking about keeping this on one of my other threads but I realised that I don't want to fill that up with suggested challenges from you. This is a series idea that I got of Strafes_ and all it is, is challenges to do while playing Minecraft!

As always I am going to update this with the newest video of this series, so subscribe to this thread. Subscribing to EMBY and I are optional :D

Videos:
F5 Challenge (Ep1)
Keyboard and Mouse Challenge (Ep2)

Please feel free to suggest any challenges we haven't done yet!

title: Minecraft Challenges! w/ EMBY

replies.body: Nise. You did better than me in f5, I had 1 kill and 17 deaths before I rage-quitted.

replies.body:
I am uploading Episode 2! Please suggest any challenges that we could do.

P.S - To complete the challenge we can either get 5 or 10 kills or 1 monument!
replies.body_tagged:
I am uploading Episode 2! Please suggest any challenges that we could do.

P.S - To complete the challenge we can either get 5 or 10 kills or 1 monument!

replies.body: Isn't five kills a little too easy though? At least make it five kills in one life :3
replies.body_tagged: Isn't five kills a little too easy though? At least make it five kills in one life :3

replies.body: We aren't as good as you :P It has taken us 20+ minutes to get 5 kills on the challenges we have done so far! (BTW We have done 2 challenges)

replies.body:
I challenge you to get 10 kills with the super secret setting: Upside-down.

Good luck bud, you'll need it >:)
